name: Monk
description: Take a student from the card and place him on an island of your choice

name: Farmer
description: During this turn, you take control of the Professors even if you have the same number of Students in your hall as the player currently controlling them.

name: Herald
description: Choose an island and calculate the influence as if Mother Nature stopped there

name: Centaur
description: During this turn the towers do not count in the influence calculation

name: Jester
description: You can take up to 3 students from this card and exchange them with as many students in your entrance

name: Knight
description: During this turn you have 2 additional points during the influence count

name: Mushroom Seller
description: Choose a Student color. This turn, that color provides no influence when calculating influence

name: Minstrel
description: You can exchange up to 2 Students present in your Hall and in your Entrance

name: Spoiled Princess
description: Take a Student from this card and place it in your Hall. Then take a new Student out of the sack and place it on this card.

name: Thief
description: Choose a Student color; each player (including you) must return 3 Students of that color present in your Hall to the sack. Whoever has less will put all he has
